doc.title: Chloe: The Story of a Sex Addict
doc.plot: Chloe plays an innocent young women in a bad relationship. She's crushed when she comes homes one day to find her husband in bed with another women. After attempting suicide, she is rescued by a young doctor. Her rescuer's plans are not altruistic, however. He takes the injured young woman back to his house, where he keeps her locked up and sexually abuses her. Chloe struggles to escape, but also finds herself being drawn into her captor's dark world.
